mapper.select: select * from kj_icbc where id=(select max(id) from kj_icbc)
select count(*) from kj_icbc where bc_status=2

select icbc.*, kk.id as kkid, dk.id as dkid, mq.id as mqid from kj_icbc icbc LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_kk kk on kk.icbc_id=icbc.id LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_cardk dk on dk.icbc_id=icbc.id LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_mq mq on mq.icbc_id=icbc.id where icbc.gems_code=#{gems_code}
select ki.*, fs.name as gname, gems.name as pname from kj_icbc ki LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on ki.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on ki.gems_id=gems.id where ki.id=#{id}

select ki.*, dk.icbc_id, ac.icbc_id, kk.icbc_id, mq.icbc_id, dk.id as dkid, ac.id as acid, kk.id as kkid, mq.id as mqid, dk.bc_status as bc_status2, kk.bc_status as bc_status3, mq.bc_status as bc_status4, ac.bc_status as bc_status5, fs.`name` as gname, gems.`name` as pname from kj_icbc ki LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_cardk dk on ki.id=dk.icbc_id LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_kk kk on ki.id=kk.icbc_id LEFT JOIN kjs_icbc_mq mq on ki.id=mq.icbc_id LEFT JOIN assess_cars ac on ki.id=ac.icbc_id LEFT JOIN assess_fs fs on ki.gems_fs_id=fs.id LEFT JOIN assess_gems gems on ki.gems_id=gems.id where 1=1 and ki.bc_status!=1
and ki.query_type =0
and ki.query_type =#{querytype}
and (ki.bc_status =#{bc_status} or dk.bc_status =#{bc_status} or kk.bc_status =#{bc_status} or mq.bc_status =#{bc_status} or ac.bc_status =#{bc_status} )
GROUP BY ki.id ORDER BY ki.dt_edit DESC
mapper.update: update kj_icbc set adminop_tag=#{adminop_tag} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into kj_icbc( id, mid_add, mid_edit, dt_add, dt_edit, bc_status, gems_id, gems_fs_id, gems_code, query_type, c_name, c_tel, c_cardno, bank_id, loan_tpid, loan_level, c_name_mt, c_tel_mt, c_cardno_mt, kk_kpj, kk_loan_amount, kk_loan_amount_s, kk_loan_amount_total, kk_loan_ajms, kk_loan_ajqx, kk_loan_ajyh, kk_loan_rate, kk_car_stateid, kk_car_cityid, kk_loan_stateid, kk_loan_cityid, imgstep2_1, imgstep2_2, imgstep2_3, imgstep2_4, imgstep2_5, imgstep2_5s, c_sex, zx_result, dt_zxresult, dt_zxsub, zxok_tag, api_add, api_edit, querytype, dt_fin, adminop_tag, dt_backtofin, book_status, card_status, tr_status, tr_msg, tr_tag, dsj_result, dsj_report_id, dsj_result_time, c_name_gj1, c_name_gj2, c_tel_gj1, c_tel_gj2, c_cardno_gj1, c_cardno_gj2, dt_sub, fromid, fk_status, gems_id_first, zjlx, po_zx_result, gjr_zx_result1, gjr_zx_result2, po_dsj_report_id, gjr_dsj_report_id1, gjr_dsj_report_id2, imgstep8_1ss )values( #{id}, #{mid_add}, #{mid_edit}, #{dt_add}, #{dt_edit}, #{bc_status}, #{gems_id}, #{gems_fs_id}, #{gems_code}, #{query_type}, #{c_name}, #{c_tel}, #{c_cardno}, #{bank_id}, #{loan_tpid}, #{loan_level}, #{c_name_mt}, #{c_tel_mt}, #{c_cardno_mt}, #{kk_kpj}, #{kk_loan_amount}, #{kk_loan_amount_s}, #{kk_loan_amount_total}, #{kk_loan_ajms}, #{kk_loan_ajqx}, #{kk_loan_ajyh}, #{kk_loan_rate}, #{kk_car_stateid}, #{kk_car_cityid}, #{kk_loan_stateid}, #{kk_loan_cityid}, #{imgstep2_1}, #{imgstep2_2}, #{imgstep2_3}, #{imgstep2_4}, #{imgstep2_5}, #{imgstep2_5s}, #{c_sex}, #{zx_result}, #{dt_zxresult}, #{dt_zxsub}, #{zxok_tag}, #{api_add}, #{api_edit}, #{querytype}, #{dt_fin}, #{adminop_tag}, #{dt_backtofin}, #{book_status}, #{card_status}, #{tr_status}, #{tr_msg}, #{tr_tag}, #{dsj_result}, #{dsj_report_id}, #{dsj_result_time}, #{c_name_gj1}, #{c_name_gj2}, #{c_tel_gj1}, #{c_tel_gj2}, #{c_cardno_gj1}, #{c_cardno_gj2}, #{dt_sub}, #{fromid}, #{fk_status}, #{gems_id_first}, #{zjlx}, #{po_zx_result}, #{gjr_zx_result1}, #{gjr_zx_result2}, #{po_dsj_report_id}, #{gjr_dsj_report_id1}, #{gjr_dsj_report_id2}, #{imgstep8_1ss}
)
